page.title: 15Recreation in Bognor Regis
page.content: Bognor Regis has a lively football club known as the Rocks with about 4000 supporters. The town is provided with facilities for most sports. {Hotham Park}offers tennis courts,a small zoo,peaceful walks among rare trees, a children's railway,crazy golf, putting and a boating lake. To the East in Felpham there is the { {Arun Leisure Centre}. There is no swimming pool in Bognor(a new pool for the Arun District being sited at Littlehampton much to the annoyance of the population of Bognor). Bognor Regis Comprehensive School has its own indoor pool which is heavily used and swimming clubs have {limited }use of the swimming facilities at Butlins. The beach allows such sports as windsurfing,sailing,fishing etc.
